title: After LeaverBuster
body: Ok so just wondering I have my 20 min low priority queue now whats after this a ban, a reset?

replies.body:
If you continue to disconnect from games, you'll continue to get low-priority queues added to your account. Check out our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for a complete rundown of the system.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
